synapseclient
=============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which synapseclient installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using synapseclient, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load synapseclient/3.0.0-GCCcore-12.2.0
```
